name: Toggle Blocks
description:
- Easy to learn, difficult to master
- Multiple ways to solve every level
- Discover new types of blocks as you advance
- Try to discover the optimal patterns
- Beautiful UI and fluid animations
- More than 50 puzzles to keep you entertained

Tapping a block will toggle itself and all of its neighbouring blocks.
A level is finished when there are no more white blocks in play.
